official_title: A bill to provide that, following adoption of this Act, Veterans' Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.

summary.text: Provides that Veterans' Day shall be observed on the 11th of November of each year.

titles.title: A bill to provide that, following adoption of this Act, Veterans' Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.
